f261aa65-6248-4f0f-91a0-46623b76a93b.description: The ALII-Map assessment is a research-based multi rater that statistically valid instrument. The ALII Map helps mid to senior level leaders gain powerful clarity about the strength of their influence, and helps organizations enhance the ongoing effectiveness of leaders as they advance. ALII-Map Enterprise focuses on how the leader engages with the organization as well as with teams and individuals.
f261aa65-6248-4f0f-91a0-46623b76a93b.name: ALII Map Enterprise

badge_template_activities.title: Three day certification course covering the ALII Map assessment , debriefing the assessment, access and navigation of the online assessment portal

skills.name: Ablility To Provide A Focused Leadership Multi-rater Assessment
